Largo.Belleair Beach, Florida:
Belleair Beach is a city in Pinellas County, Florida, United States. The population was 1,560 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Belleair Beach is located at 27°55′29″N 82°50′22″W.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of 1.7 square miles (4.5 km2), of which 0.46 square miles (1.2 km2) is land and 1.2 square miles (3.2 km2) (72.12%) is water.
